description:
NES/Famicom emulator based on FCEUX 2.1.6-svn. Tested running 60fps on the Pre. Install the "Remove Tap Locator" patch from Preware to improve performance when using touch controls. NOTE: The user must supply their own game ROMs and transfer them to the device's internal storage for use with this app.

Features:
* Accurate emulation and high compatibility rate, similar to FCEUX 2.1.5 for PCs.
* Backup memory and save state support, auto-save and ten manual slots for save states. State files from FCEUX should work on NES.emu and vice-versa. (NOTE: write access to /media/internal is required, some versions of WebOS 1.4.5 are broken and need to be re-installed via WebOS Doctor)
* Supports ROM-based games in .nes and .unf formats, optionally in .zip files
* Famicom Disk System emulation using .fds files (Select your BIOS in the options first)
* VS UniSystem support, push Start to insert coins
* Zapper/Gun support, touch screen to fire, touch & hold outside of display area to simulate firing away from the TV.
* Configurable on-screen multi-touch controls & keyboard support
* iCade support (WebOS 2.0 or later)
* Portrait/Landscape orientation support

NOTE: Video shows iOS version but core functionallity is identical except for Wiimote support

Follow me on Twitter for updates about my apps:
https://twitter.com/rakashazi

Visit the homepage at explusalpha.com for more info, ports for other platforms, and my other apps.
